item.title: Help me declare this
item.dc:creator: @bobbarker369 bobbarker369
item.description:
@bobbarker369 wrote:

if (id == 33208){
if (miningclicked == true){
teleport(2938,9884,0);
miningclicked = false
}else{
miningclicked = true
sendMessage(“Click this button again to be teleported to some rune rocks!”);
}

}

Alright…I need to declare the mining clicked boolean…I’m a good coder, It’s just that i usually have the other coders of my server declare for me and It’s time I learn.

public boolean miningclicked = true;…i have no clue what else…I’m pretty sure I have to declare the public boolean miningclicked = true as well
